sql:
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM title t, cast_info ci, movie_info_idx mi_idx
WHERE t.id = ci.movie_id AND t.id = mi_idx.movie_id AND t.kind_id  =  7 AND t.production_year  <  2005 AND ci.person_id  =  1302434 AND ci.role_id  <  2 AND mi_idx.info_type_id  =  99
